title: One major bug
text:
I‚Äôve had this app for quite a long time. Years, really. I haven‚Äôt had any major issues throughout, but recently I‚Äôve had a bug where, for a specific few content creators, there‚Äôs a bug with ads that makes the actual video unwatchable.
What happens is, I click on a video and it loads an ad. The ad then cuts and it changes to the video. This has happened, usually if there‚Äôs a loading error with ad. However, then the video cuts back to the ad, which doesn‚Äôt load, and cuts back to the video, and so on and so forth. I thought it was just a one-off, so I tried another video by the same person. Same issue. I restarted my phone and the app, no fix. I came back days later, same issue with the same person. I‚Äôve only had it happen with two creators, but they are ones I would regularly watch so I‚Äôm a little annoyed.

title: I love this app, but...
text: This is my favourite app, but when I put my music playlist on shuffle, it will play maybe one or two songs. After those one or two videos, it will jump back to the second video on the list (it shows my videos in order even when it‚Äôs on shuffle) and it will play it over and over and over again. And when I skip it, it won‚Äôt even go to the next video, it will stay on that video. Also, sometimes when I turn on shuffle, it will show it in shuffle order, and it will have the perfect order, but when I listen to a few songs, it will start on the song I just listened to, and shuffle the whole thing again. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs supposed to shuffle over and over, but I thought that I should mention it. But, please fix these possible bugs, because once again, this is my favourite app. Thank you!

title: The restriction mode, and removal of comments on child-friendly content
text:
I had to watch a video for school, but the thing is that the video was restricted. 

My father wants me to have restricted mode on to remove inappropriate videos. However, many videos I try to watch will be restricted, I‚Äôll then go to watch it on the tv or my brother‚Äôs computer and I‚Äôll find that the videos aren‚Äôt really that inappropriate. If you‚Äôre going to have a restricted mode, restrict videos that ARE inappropriate, not ones that only have a drop of blood in them, or have jokes that could be inappropriate to 5 year olds.

I would like to watch French videos for my class without the ‚Äúthis video is restricted‚Äù showing up to block my view. 

I also can‚Äôt turn off restricted mode even when my network admin does, it‚Äôs annoying.

As for the comments, children learn inappropriate things from both the internet and real life. Removing the comments for child content is ridiculous and absurd; remove the harmful comments, not the entirety.
A child-friendly content maker I know lost the ability to receive comments simply because she put her videos as kid-friendly. She loved viewing those comments.

This is just my advice and viewpoint. I don‚Äôt really mind the app itself, it‚Äôs a pretty good app, the creators are just kind of ruining it themselves, not the app‚Äôs fault lol

title: Frustrating Recommendations!

title: Does not work 90% of time with Apple TV

When I hit ‚ÄòTap to Retry‚Äô i have to watch another ad, there is an error after that again, and then cycle repeats itself again, again and again, indefinitely. At one point i had to skip through 10 ads, but i still could not watch the content i wanted to watch. Tried different video - same issue. I guess Google isn‚Äôt really interested if I get to watch what I want to watch as long as ads keep playing and ad revenue keeps coming in...

title: Broken Femur
text: I just wanted to see how much force it takes to break a femur, since it‚Äôs the largest bone in the human body and, years ago I actually broke a friend of mine‚Äôs femur playing Babe Ruth baseball. We had an infield fly and neither of us called it and ended up colliding and going to the ground. I got up just fine but he stayed on the dirt yelling in pain. I was the only girl in the league that year and the year before and felt so bad for doing that. At that time, I wasn‚Äôt sure what I had exactly done and 911 had been called for him. I visited him days later but he was obviously still recovering. Years later he would still joke around and ask me if I‚Äôve broken any legs lately? We just laugh about it. I‚Äôm still lost on how I could have broke that bone though.

title: New updates and visually looks different, in a bad way
text:
3 stars as there‚Äôs tons of bugs I‚Äôve always had problems with/things about the layout I‚Äôve had trouble with for years, I‚Äôm not inclined to be generous to the Big Company. 
 Today my app updated and everything looks a little different in an uncomfortable way, I do not like it and don‚Äôt like that there‚Äôs no way to change it back to how it looked before. 
It‚Äôs darker than usual on dark mode, which makes it harder to see on the pure black instead of the soft grey.

title: Lagging Inbox Tab
text: Ever since the introduction of the inbox tab about two years ago, there‚Äôs been this weird lag when I tap on the notifications tab where it won‚Äôt register that I looked at the notification. So when I go to a different tab, the notification will still be active (e.g., if I have two notifications, the number 2 will still be present even when I‚Äôve checked the notifications). I have to manually go back in and check them again for it to clear, and even then it might not for a while. It‚Äôs very annoying, and after two years of development and even eliminating the messaging feature in the inbox tab, I would think that a company with as much money and resources as Google would‚Äôve ironed this out a long time ago. (Also, this has been my experience across multiple platforms, i.e. an iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone X, and iPad Pro 2018, so it‚Äôs not specific to my device.)

title: Stick to what you‚Äôre good at

title: Way too many ads
text:
Well programmed app, other than the continually increasing number of ads. Not only are they at the beginning, middle, and end of videos now... they also show up as I'm scrolling looking for videos placed between every 3-5 videos. I'd assume doing stuff like this has a limit. People become desensitized to ads and eventually just either stop using your service or become mentally programmed to completely ignore them. Either way, it's less revenue in the longterm, even if you see an increase now. More != better.

I just wanted to add on that it's really disappointing how bad a lot of the content has gotten, especially with the proliferation of shorts.  I saw a video that said "you're walking wrong," before I instantly skipped it. Who  c a r e s?????  Lot of the content feels like wading through ads, now.  Maybe that's just a necessity of having so many videos and the parameters the algorithm prioritizes.

title: Good app back in the day
text: The links to videos has gone way down hill, especially on the app in the last few years. The app seems to only suggest something I have already looked up or seen for the most part, and suggests things that I have little to no interest in when it comes to things other than music, although this has been slightly better in the last few months it‚Äôs still a far cry from how good it was in the past. Furthermore it seems that now some videos are removed for there content while other videos that display similar ideas or problematic content, but from a different view are left up for some reason. If one person saying or doing something is deemed not ok then another person with the direct conflicting points of view must also deemed not ok, or else the is a one sided landslide effect that occurs. A truly open form for differing opinions, ideas, and beliefs of all is the only way for an online community to flourish.

title: A late April Fool's joke?
text: The new format is an absolute joke. If you tap the screen, there's way too much that appears over the video. Swipe up during this, and you might as well just put your phone away since there's even more display over the video. Showing the creator's channel as an overlay during this is absolutely redundant and worse than useless due to the fact that it's already listed below the video itself (when not in landscape mode), or by tapping on the video in the first place. If you accidentally tap on it, it either minimizes your video and takes you to the channel, subscribes/unsubscribes you, or clicks/unclicks the bell. The new swiping action to change the video is an absolutely horrible way of navigating, for many reasons. Try to wipe off a spec of dust on your screen? It's the next video. Try to wipe off a fingerprint? Next video. Try to rewind or skip forward in the video with the play bar at the bottom, but miss by 1mm? Different video. It's horrible. The entire format overhaul is, at best, a shameful mistake.

I don‚Äôt watch any other reviewer from him, because he‚Äôs always so honest about the pieces of technology he‚Äôs reviewing, and when he talks about a topic, he‚Äôs always so honest and you just can‚Äôt deny the facts he does. This app is a 5 stars from me and if you don‚Äôt use it I highly recommend you use it. Just one issue though; allow less porn on your app please. title: Easy enough for my 2yr old daughter to navigate!
text: I love that their are some really great shows ‚Äúlittle angel‚Äù ‚Äúcocomelon‚Äù and a few others have such great teachings. They show manners, kindness, and lots of daily life circumstances- how to deal with them and more so show her what to expect like when going to the dentist or the doctor or how sometimes medicine doesn‚Äôt taste good but makes us feel better. I can say all these same things to her but when she hears it being reintroduced while watching these shows it sure helps her understanding of the things I tell her as well. She is able to navigate through different episodes or change to a new teaching is her attention span has moved on and needs new stimulation. I am very grateful! Thank you Utube!!!!

title: Some issues on iPad
text:
It is a good platform for watching many varied videos, but suffers from some problems.
-Commenting has issues. Sometimes a comment infinitely processes with the ‚Äúloading‚Äù symbol. Other times, it‚Äôs an issue to click out of writing a comment. You usually are able to tap on the screen away from the comment typing box at any time to close it and return to the main interface, but sometimes it just doesn‚Äôt work and you must close the app in itself. Replying to comments almost always leaves a double reply, which is more of a visual glitch since it reappears when going back to the comment chain you had left a reply on.
-Every video has a ‚ÄúNot interested‚Äù you can select. While watching a video, there is a recommendations bar at the right of the screen. The video at the very top of this bar does not have a Not interested selection, so if you do not like the video at all you will still get it recommended to you.
-The app randomly crashes often
-When scrolling through the play bar, most videos show you a small screenshot of what displays at that point in time of the video. Other videos do not have this.
-Finally, this one isn‚Äôt an issue but could be useful. Advertising options, such as not immediately starting the video after an advertisement ends for more information.

title: This app is part of why I don't own a Google phone
text:
Google's software quality is amazingly bad.  For a company that has literally innovated the Internet up to where it is today, they really drop the ball on simple things.  Like proper handling of screen rotation.   (Has anyone even had this problem in ANY other mobile app?  I haven't.  Yet it has plagued YT for years.)  Or that one bug where video would restart from the beginning while audio kept going.  (Thankfully that seems to be fixed now, but it was a problem for way too long.)  With the latest update, YT is now able to turn my phone into a hand warmer.  30 min of video drained a quarter of my battery life.  Well that's new.

I've got to learn not to update this app anymore when I finally run across a version that works.  Or, more accurately, when the bugs it has don't affect me enough to care.

Get your $@!# together, Google.  "It compiles" is not QA.

title: Kinda obvious for a 4 star review
text: It is a very great website ever since I think 2008 but over the years it slowly degraded but it is still pretty great the only reason I removed a star is because of how poor the security system is by putting weird stuff in yt kids like the Warner Bros splatter incident and people are still making those weird animations with kids characters getting funky on screen for toddlers to see, sometimes ads are a problem sometimes they pop up too much like you can watch a video get an unskippable ad then 2 minutes later you get another one. Either than that it‚Äôs a great app, having great creators on the app like Coryxkenshin, Markiplier, Rabbert, and a lot more like Kallmekris (I think that how you spell it) and Luke Davidson pretty great app which is why I didn‚Äôt give it a three star.

title: Worse everyday
text:
Used to be great, but the service is rapidly deteriorating. Bring back the dislikes and tone down the ads and you‚Äôll get your stars back, but as of now you‚Äôre losing my trust rapidly and I‚Äôll be looking for either a new service or ditch this service entirely, which is terrible because you used to be an amazingly fun and seemingly reliable source of scientific reports, but now there‚Äôs no way to effectively review these, and that‚Äôs REQUIRED because this info could mean life/death in some situations! I can‚Äôt waste my time on pseudoscientists and novices. SHM, you‚Äôre failing so fast, and you‚Äùve just doubled down on this, so sad..
Update: App is worse than before.  Quality content can‚Äôt be found reliably and they‚Äôre pushing shorts which are basically spam content.  You can‚Äôt see the ratings on videos anymore so you waste time on this spam, while corporations disable commenting so it‚Äôs impossible to express your distaste with their behavior.  We deserve better than this.

title: Babysitters
text:
You're always watched, you're always recorded, you're told what you're allowed to watch, you're told what you may be interested in, you're being told what's good for you and all by people to whom have no clue about reality of the dangerous world full of lies, yet lets you think you have choices ... Your new digital nanny slash online police state brought to you by your communists, fascists, socialists, and collage educated communities!!!! 
Your grandparents warned you about this while you sat and played playstation, xBox and your iPhone games ..... while veggie gardens, cow farts and rain water are called dangerous to our health and the climate! Let's burn more egg hatcheries, food processing plants and make bread the price of a bag of gold!! NOW, all that's left is house-to-house round ups, arrests, loaded trucks and then re-education or death camps. SO ... give up your weapon of choice and get on the truck to your new and FINAL destination!!! So much for gender reassignment when gender won't matter - only your life!!

title: Accessibility problem with voice over
text: So I have seen all these reviews mentioning how the comments section has moved, and it really makes it feel different. However, there is an accessibility problem which I actually saw this morning, and it wasn‚Äôt like this yesterday, as of when this review is posted. Which is May 21, 2020. The accessibility issue I‚Äôm having is I can‚Äôt swipe up or down with my one finger to adjust the timing of the video that I‚Äôm watching. It‚Äôs not a glitch with the iOS 13.5 update for the iPhone, I think it‚Äôs just some thing that the app did. Because when I swipe down with my finger, which is supposed to rewind the video, all it does is make more progress in the video, and it doesn‚Äôt rewind like it should.

title: Used to be my favorite app to watch vids
text:
This app used to be my favorite app because it helps me get my crocheting ideas and watch for entertainment but, I have many bugs and problems that I‚Äôm very sure of many are speaking out. For one thing, the amount of time it takes to load for a video to unpause or starting to play is very ridiculous. Second, there are too many ads to for a person to wait on all day. Third, I have crashes every single time I go to search to what I want. Fourth, the Notification Center is broken and I don‚Äôt get any notifications anymore. Finally the comment section blocks the videos I plan to watch next by. I certainly hope that the people of the app to please take the time to listen  to your clients as they give you advice and suggestions to whether to improve your app and reviews. 
From keeping it professional,
The client 
P.s this is the only time to  I give out a constructive feedback before things get pretty critical. Thanks. :3

title: ‚ÄúMix list‚Äù glitching
text: Still having technical problems with the mixes. Won‚Äôt let me bring up my mixes when listening/watching anything. Upon a video being loaded, the bar you tap at the bottom won‚Äôt come up but rather stays faded out. Also, whenever I select another video to cancel the playlist, it won‚Äôt let me look at anything other then the video/images playing whether I make it full screen or half. Everything around/underneath it is an empty mix list which is very odd considering the mix isn‚Äôt even active anymore, but a stand alone video. No video suggestions or anything else is visible. I have to completely exit the app to reset the glitch, but still has problems on occasion re-occurring. Hopefully you can grasp the concepts of what I‚Äôm saying through my writings.

title: Why did you change the comment section? (Mobile)
text:
It annoys me so much because I‚Äôve been so accustomed for years to scrolling down to the comment section but there‚Äôs nothing there so I have to scroll all the way back up. It doesn‚Äôt seems like much, and I guess it‚Äôs truly not, but after making this mistake so many times even I start to get annoyed. 

Also, I keep on exiting out of the comments section after the change because that‚Äôs how you were able to exit the Replies section in the old one, which further added onto my annoyance.

Call me stingy, but I‚Äôd rather it go back to how it previously was. What was even the point? At most it saves at least a second (not even a second to be honest) for the action of scrolling down to it. Also, there are sometimes videos that catch my eye as I do so in a way it does better to promote other videos than what they have now.

title: Constant unnecessary changes
text: This app used to be great but now every month or so there‚Äôs a new change. Usually it‚Äôs something completely useless that just makes the use of the app more frustrating. Like the most recent change with the way to view comments, instead of scrolling down you have to click on this box. And recommended videos don‚Äôt even have information next to them on how long ago they were made. What‚Äôs the point of this change?? There are many more examples but anyways it‚Äôs just so annoying, also I remember when you could shuffle play your playlists and it worked great. Now it only shuffles like the first few videos in that playlist.. I wish someone could revert these changes. (Edit) nothing gets changed, I thought they fixed the comment section and I was honestly going to give 5 stars but now it‚Äôs back to clicking some annoying box first. This is such an annoying change omg, it‚Äôs honestly so inconvenient

title: Unwanted change
text:
Can you please switch to the old card view when you pull down videos to search for others? It used to just fill the bottom right, but now it fills the entire bottom as an elongated card instead of just the video, and it even makes the video part smaller and chops off some of the top and bottom of the video which I dislike.

I don‚Äôt need to have the whole title down there. Go back to the old style and make the card of variable size depending on the video. I noticed that videos are actually 4:3 or of other lengths when viewing them in portrait mode now, instead of always showing in a 16:9 area with letterboxing. I absolutely love that change and it would be super amazing if you could implement the old pull-down card version with that addition.

I really prefer swiping to the left to dismiss those video cards instead of down with the new style as well.

title: Needs a little improvement
text: I like the app it just has a few glitches that need to be fixed. When I start watching a video it takes forever to load than when it starts playing it stops about 10 seconds into the video and it says it‚Äôs loading when it‚Äôs not. I restart the video a few times and it stops at the same place so I close out of the video and try again. Sometimes it works but most of the time it doesn‚Äôt so I have to repeat the process multiple times. Another thing is that when there is an add it takes a really long time to load or it doesn‚Äôt load. I‚Äôm the middle of a video I close out then I have to repeat the process I do at the beginning. Than when it finally starts working correctly I have to find my place and that takes even longer to load. I‚Äôve tried uninstalling the app and reinstalling but that doesn‚Äôt fix the problem.
